sources.title: Fury Below (1936) CRIME DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Russell Gleason, Maxine Doyle, LeRoy Mason 
Director: Harry L. Fraser

An heir to a mining operation, suffering from unexplained low production, is facing a strike by the miners. He will lose the mine if production doesn't increase, but an office-secretary accidentally learns of a plot to force the mine to be sold!

metadata.Plot: Jim Cole, heir to a mining operation, takes over the mine, which is suffering from unexplained low production, and is facing a strike by the miners. Jim will soon loose the mine if production doesn't increase and the sabotage continues. Mary Norsen, office-secretary, accidentally learns of a plot by Fred Johnson to wreck the mine and force Cole to sell his coal-mine. She and her brother, Joe, join Cole in his fight to stop Johnson.
metadata.Actors: Russell Gleason, Maxine Doyle, LeRoy Mason
